ing: 1/2 teaspoon chocolate syrup, or to taste
des: "This is a recipe for my favorite martini from a bar in Indianapolis that is now closed. Delicious!"
ins: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice; add white chocolate liqueur, strawberry vodka, creme de banana liqueur, and chocolate syrup. Cover and shake until the outside of shaker has frosted. Strain into a chilled glass and garnish with a maraschino cherry.
